definition: large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Speaking: discuss the following questions about smoking in the workplace.
sentences.chinese: 就下列關於在工作場所吸菸的問題進行討論。

sentences.english: Human Factors is the discipline of optimising human performance in the workplace.
sentences.chinese: 人的因素，是優化人在工作場所的表現紀律。

sentences.english: The detention house is the main place for the implementation of pre-trial detention.
sentences.chinese: 看守所是我國審前羈押的主要執行場所。

sentences.english: I really admire your courage in biting your toe nail in public.
sentences.chinese: 我真信服你敢於在平易近衆場所咬腳趾甲的勇氣。

sentences.english: It is a common fallacy to regard school as theonly workshop for the acquisition of knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 視學校爲汲取知識的唯一場所是種常見的謬誤。

sentences.english: Cyndi continued to play local clubs, but this time as a solo artist.
sentences.chinese: 她又繼續遊走於小型娛樂場所，這次卻是她一個人。

sentences.english: They are employed by telephone and other telecommunications transmission services establishments.
sentences.chinese: 他們受僱於電話和其他電信傳輸服務場所。

sentences.english: It is the world 's largest nuclear waste facility.
sentences.chinese: 這是世界上最大的核廢料處理場所。

sentences.english: But other people enjoy hearing Muzak in public places.
sentences.chinese: 而其他人喜歡在公共場所聽繆扎克。

sentences.english: Police then rushed to the scene to sort out the horse and Luo Tuoqing meeting place.
sentences.chinese: 警方隨後趕赴現場將馬和駱駝清理出集會場所。

sentences.english: They are an appropriate venue for trying detainees for violations of the laws of war.
sentences.chinese: 軍事委員會是審理觸犯戰爭法的在押人員的合適場所。

sentences.english: Amoebas turn out to be great places to seek out new viruses.
sentences.chinese: 變形蟲變成尋找新病毒的好場所。

sentences.english: Lusu's fire pit is the center of family activities. It is also a sacred place.
sentences.chinese: 傈僳族的火塘是家庭活動的中心，也是神聖的場所。

sentences.english: Hepu gulf is of unique geographical position for pearl's growing.
sentences.chinese: 合浦沿海得天獨厚的海灣是繁衍珍珠的最佳場所。

sentences.english: Many people are still in the habit of wring silly things in public places.
sentences.chinese: 許多人仍然有在公共場所亂塗亂畫的壞習慣。

sentences.english: However, when the revellers saw the nun, the room went dead silent.
sentences.chinese: 那些人見到修女進來，整個場所登時變得死寂。

definition: between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
